archimate:Artifact.name: Published Segments
archimate:Artifact.documentation:
${druid.zk.paths.base}/segments
Paths in Zookeeper updated by Historicals and MiddleManagers / Indexers, announcing the segments that they are serving. ${druid.zk.paths.servedSegmentsPath}/${druid.host}
Announcements are grouped by server, and then each server's segment. ${druid.zk.paths.servedSegmentsPath}/${druid.host}/_segment_identifier_
Used for querying purposes by the broker and by the coordinator for assignment and balance.
